title: Wall Street Breakfast November 3: Apple Now Worth More Than Alphabet, Amazon And Meta Combined
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Apple (AAPL) is now worth more than Alphabet (GOOG) (GOOGL), Amazon (AMZN) and Meta (META) combined. Elon Musk plans to cut half of Twitter jobs to slash costs - reports. S&P futures dip, yields jump as market comes to grips with Fed's 'hawkish dovish pivot'.Learn how to invest successfully with Alpha Picks here.
